import { Story, Preview, Props } from "@storybook/addon-docs/blocks";

# OptionBox
```import { OptionBox } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Atom";```

This OptionBox are built with react-select, so you can use default props from react-select. see complete documentation <a href={`https://react-select.com/home`} target="_blank">here</a> <br/>
some common usage sample are put at basic canvas knobs, all by means to check it out.

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-option-box--basic" />
</Preview>

## Menu Portal

OptionBox exposes a `menuPortalTarget` prop, that let you portaling the menu-dopdown to a dom node of your choosing (as your need).

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-option-box--menu-portal"/>
</Preview>

## Multi Selected

OptionBox support multiple selected by using props `isMulti`

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-option-box--multi-selected"/>
</Preview>
